TEXT.TITLE: FIDELCOR <FICR> COMPLETES SALE OF UNIT
TEXT.BODY: Fidelcor Inc said it has completed the sale of its Industrial Valley Title Insurance Co subsidiary to a group of investors including the unit's management for undisclosed terms. Industrial Valley has assets of about 37.6 mln dlrs and was acquired last year along with IVB Financial Corp. Reuter
